titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 83) proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States regarding the appointment of individuals to fill vacancies in the House of Representatives.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Baird. Petition No: 108-7.

bill.summary: 3/23/2004--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.J. Res. 83 (Constitutional Amendment to fill vacancies in the House of Representatives).
